title: DEWA's CSR efforts recognised by MVO 8000 certification and ISO 26000 (Dubai Electricity and Water ...
text: ( Source : Dubai Electricity and Water Authority ) Sat, 10 Oct 2015 Dubai Electricity and Water Authority (DEWA) has received MVO 8000 certification in social responsibility. It has also reached a status of 'Advanced' for its ISO 26000 social
